Rare Special Items.name: ★ Sport Gloves | Pandora's Box
Rare Special Items.desc: Synthetic fabrics make these athletic gloves durable and eye-catching. The black and purple gloves have a subtle pattern printed on the palms.
Rare Special Items.lore: A must have for any demolitions expert with sweaty palms

Rare Special Items.name: ★ Moto Gloves | Boom!
Rare Special Items.desc: These bulky hard knuckled gloves can protect the wearers hands from road rash at 60 mph. This pair has been covered in comic book onomatopoeia.
Rare Special Items.lore: POW! BOOM! BIFF!

Rare Special Items.name: ★ Bloodhound Gloves | Snakebite
Rare Special Items.desc: These fingerless gloves have been decorated with metal studs and the Operation Bloodhound logo. It was crafted with a mix of leather and snakeskin.
Rare Special Items.lore: Let's be honest... no one misses Sergei - Hans Kriegeld, Phoenix Tactician

Rare Special Items.name: ★ Moto Gloves | Cool Mint
Rare Special Items.desc: These bulky hard knuckled gloves can protect the wearers hands from road rash at 60 mph. The soft blue leather has been accented with arctic colored geometric designs.
Rare Special Items.lore: Combat has never felt so refreshing.

Rare Special Items.name: ★ Specialist Gloves | Forest DDPAT
Rare Special Items.desc: Durable, breathable, and stylish; these gloves are designed to take (and give) a beating. The hand stitched leather has been paired with rugged DDPAT printed fabric.
Rare Special Items.lore: Some people don't like getting their hands dirty

Rare Special Items.name: ★ Hand Wraps | Spruce DDPAT
Rare Special Items.desc: Preferred by hand-to-hand fighters, these wraps protect the knuckles and stabilize the wrist when punching. The outer wrap is fabric screen printed with grey digital camo.
Rare Special Items.lore: Some people say they're tough... others show it

Rare Special Items.name: ★ Specialist Gloves | Foundation
Rare Special Items.desc: Durable, breathable, and stylish; these gloves are designed to take (and give) a beating. The white and black gloves have been given orange accents
Rare Special Items.lore: Rumor has it that Tortue was inspired by the Asiimov line of firearms

Rare Special Items.name: ★ Hand Wraps | Badlands
Rare Special Items.desc: Preferred by hand-to-hand fighters, these wraps protect the knuckles and stabilize the wrist when punching. This DIY hand protection is made of scavenged materials.
Rare Special Items.lore: Felix turns a blind eye towards the Colation Taskforce's unsanctioned boxing league

Rare Special Items.name: ★ Moto Gloves | Spearmint
Rare Special Items.desc: These bulky hard knuckled gloves can protect the wearers hands from road rash at 60 mph. White leather and red stitching make these gloves as stylish as they are comfortable.
Rare Special Items.lore: For what he's charging us, you'd think Huxley could at least throw in a tin of mints... - Felix Riley, Commanding Officer

Rare Special Items.name: ★ Specialist Gloves | Crimson Kimono
Rare Special Items.desc: Durable, breathable, and stylish; these gloves are designed to take (and give) a beating. This pair of black gloves has been accented with a stark red diamond pattern.
Rare Special Items.lore: Start seeing red

Rare Special Items.name: ★ Bloodhound Gloves | Guerrilla
Rare Special Items.desc: These fingerless gloves have been decorated with metal studs and the Operation Bloodhound logo. It was made with a mix of brown leather and synthetic leather with a camo print.
Rare Special Items.lore: Valeria plans on retribution, of that there can be no doubt... - Sebastien Hennequet, Sniper

Rare Special Items.name: ★ Sport Gloves | Superconductor
Rare Special Items.desc: Synthetic fabrics make these athletic gloves durable and eye-catching. The blue and black gloves are ideal for those who wish to be phenomenal.
Rare Special Items.lore: They don't want none

Rare Special Items.name: ★ Driver Gloves | Lunar Weave
Rare Special Items.desc: These driving gloves offer protection from the elements while still maintaining tactile sensation. Midnight blue suede has been interwoven with jet black leather to give these gloves a timeless look.
Rare Special Items.lore: Keeps the blood off your hands...metaphorically speaking

Rare Special Items.name: ★ Sport Gloves | Hedge Maze
Rare Special Items.desc: Synthetic fabrics make these athletic gloves durable and eye-catching. The green and white gloves were manufactured by Icarus Athletics.
Rare Special Items.lore: Only cowards fear flying close to the sun

Rare Special Items.name: ★ Sport Gloves | Arid
Rare Special Items.desc: Synthetic fabrics make these athletic gloves durable and eye-catching. Multiple shades of brown and a subtle camo print give these gloves a distinguished look.
Rare Special Items.lore: If we're going to be heroes, we may as well look the part... - Rona Sabri, Rising Star

Rare Special Items.name: ★ Bloodhound Gloves | Bronzed
Rare Special Items.desc: These fingerless gloves have been decorated with metal studs and the Operation Bloodhound logo. The leather has been dyed gun metal and bronze.
Rare Special Items.lore: Operation Bloodhound marked the end of rouge sniper Chase Turner

Rare Special Items.name: ★ Driver Gloves | Diamondback
Rare Special Items.desc: These driving gloves offer protection from the elements while still maintaining tactile sensation. It has been crafted out of a mix of tan leather, black leather, and snakeskin.
Rare Special Items.lore: Standard issue is for suckers... - Imogen, Arms Dealer In Training

Rare Special Items.name: ★ Moto Gloves | Eclipse
Rare Special Items.desc: These bulky hard knuckled gloves can protect the wearers hands from road rash at 60 mph. This is the original classic black design that made Tortue a household name.
Rare Special Items.lore: Don't call it a midlife crisis

Rare Special Items.name: ★ Hand Wraps | Slaughter
Rare Special Items.desc: Preferred by hand-to-hand fighters, these wraps protect the knuckles and stabilize the wrist when punching. Dyed crimson, these wraps make it hard to see where the fabric ends and the bloodstains begin
Rare Special Items.lore: Who doesn't love working with their hands?

Rare Special Items.name: ★ Specialist Gloves | Emerald Web
Rare Special Items.desc: Durable, breathable, and stylish; these gloves are designed to take (and give) a beating. The back of the gloves have been given a spiderweb pattern.
Rare Special Items.lore: Discipline begets success

Rare Special Items.name: ★ Driver Gloves | Crimson Weave
Rare Special Items.desc: These driving gloves offer protection from the elements while still maintaining tactile sensation. Black suede has been interwoven with scarlet leather to give these gloves a timeless look.
Rare Special Items.lore: Leave your mark, not your fingerprints

Rare Special Items.name: ★ Hand Wraps | Leather
Rare Special Items.desc: Preferred by hand-to-hand fighters, these wraps protect the knuckles and stabilize the wrist when punching. They are made of leather, gauze, and wicked intent.
Rare Special Items.lore: Become notorious

Rare Special Items.name: ★ Bloodhound Gloves | Charred
Rare Special Items.desc: These fingerless gloves have been decorated with metal studs and the Operation Bloodhound logo. It was crafted out of classic black supple leather.
Rare Special Items.lore: Challenge coins are great, but they don't draw blood when you backfist someone - Carmen Cocinero, Extraction Expert

Rare Special Items.name: ★ Driver Gloves | Convoy
Rare Special Items.desc: These driving gloves offer protection from the elements while still maintaining tactile sensation. It has been made with a mix of brown soft leather and dyed suede.
Rare Special Items.lore: Sometimes discretion is called for

Covert Skins.name: SSG 08 | Dragonfire
Covert Skins.desc: It has been given a hydrographic of a monstrous dragon snorting fire.
Covert Skins.lore: Sit on your horde and wait for any who come to take it

Covert Skins.name: M4A4 | Buzz Kill
Covert Skins.desc: This Sektor Industry firearm has been sleekly painted in yellow and green.

Classified Skins.name: Sawed-Off | Wasteland Princess
Classified Skins.desc: Someone has been keeping track of kills on the barrel.
Classified Skins.lore: A perfect gift for the sociopath that has everything...

Classified Skins.name: P90 | Shallow Grave
Classified Skins.desc: The grips have been painted to resemble rune stones, and a hydrographic of a skeleton has been applied to the stock.
Classified Skins.lore: With the amount of bodies you're racking up, who has time to dig?

Classified Skins.name: FAMAS | Mecha Industries
Classified Skins.desc: It's stark white and black design make it feel like it came from a sci-fi show.
Classified Skins.lore: Spikey blue hair and robot companion not included

Restricted Skins.name: Nova | Gila
Restricted Skins.desc: It has been covered in a lizard skin decal.
Restricted Skins.lore: You're acting like you've never been held captive by mercenaries before – The Oni and The Valkyrie Part 1

Restricted Skins.name: Dual Berettas | Royal Consorts
Restricted Skins.desc: Between the green dyed pearl handled grips, gryphon side plates, and laser etched slide; these pistols redefine elegance.
Restricted Skins.lore: Face off and release the doves

Restricted Skins.name: M4A1-S | Flashback
Restricted Skins.desc: It has been hand painted in an attempt to make a suggestion about the duality of man.
Restricted Skins.lore: For the joker in all of us

Restricted Skins.name: USP-S | Cyrex
Restricted Skins.desc: It was been given discreet red highlights to give off a futuristic feel.
Restricted Skins.lore: Imogen was the past Felix, I'm the future - Huxley, The Competition

Restricted Skins.name: G3SG1 | Stinger
Restricted Skins.desc: It has been given yellow and grey accents.
Restricted Skins.lore: A moment of pain. Then nothing.

Mil-Spec Skins.name: MP7 | Cirrus
Mil-Spec Skins.desc: It has been painted metallic blue and given a skull decal.
Mil-Spec Skins.lore: Get your head out of the clouds

Mil-Spec Skins.name: MP9 | Sand Scale
Mil-Spec Skins.desc: It has been custom painted grey and tan.
Mil-Spec Skins.lore: We must prepare for retaliation - Felix Riley, Commanding Officer

Mil-Spec Skins.name: MAG-7 | Sonar
Mil-Spec Skins.desc: It has been lightly stenciled in turquoise.
Mil-Spec Skins.lore: You're right, losing is a new experience for me – The Oni and The Valkyrie Part 2

Mil-Spec Skins.name: P2000 | Turf
Mil-Spec Skins.desc: The grip and slide have been painted metallic green.
Mil-Spec Skins.lore: The grass is always redder on the opposing side

Mil-Spec Skins.name: CZ75-Auto | Polymer
Mil-Spec Skins.desc: The slide has been given a decal that resembles a polymer formula.
Mil-Spec Skins.lore: You're not dealing with The Phoenix anymore, we know how to take care of our own... - The Daughter and the Paladin Part 2

Mil-Spec Skins.name: Galil AR | Black Sand
Mil-Spec Skins.desc: It has been custom pained in black and camo.
Mil-Spec Skins.lore: Mikah Baton is about to begin his campaign against the Coalition Taskforce

Mil-Spec Skins.name: Glock-18 | Ironwork
Mil-Spec Skins.desc: The slide has been laser etched to depict ivy and thorns.
Mil-Spec Skins.lore: Left unchecked, any garden becomes a tangled mass of weeds
